channel.title: Herald-Tribune (Custom RSS - Broad Article Grab)
channel.description: A personal RSS feed with broader article scraping from heraldtribune.com

item.title: Maryland pizza chain makes Sarasota County debut
item.description: A Maryland-based pizza chain with 70 years of history hasopenedits first Sarasota area location.

item.title: Scottish Open: Tee times, TV options for Round 1
item.description: The PGA Tour takes its talents to Scotland as the Scottish Open begins Thursday morning.

item.title: Who is leading the Scottish Open? First round scores and how to watch
item.description: The PGA Tour's best are overseas for the next two weeks, first with this unofficial warm-up to the prestigious British Open, theGenesis Scottish Open.

item.title: ✈️ On sale for Prime Day: 8 tech gadgets I never travel without
item.description: I'm abudget travelerthrough and through, but sometimes my frugal tendencies can get me into trouble. Case in point: When I was traveling home from a trip to Copenhagen, I (foolishly) updated my flight plans to take another route back which entailed an additional layover—and the promise of shavinghundredsof dollars off my original flight booking.

item.title: ⛺️ My Prime Day wishlist is full of camping gear on sale today
item.description: Whether you have a 4th of July camping trip planned for a few summer hiking adventures coming up, who doesn't love scoring a deal on new gear?

item.title: Prime Day deal: This RedTiger dash cam includes night vision for $109
item.description: Dash cams are becoming more and more popular. Maybe that's because the technology is more readily available to us, or maybe it's because more and more people want to protect the investment they are making into their vehicles. Regardless, it's a worthy purchase—but you don't have to pay full price.
